bio:
Violet lives in Whiterun. She works as a barmaid at the Bannered Mare, a popular inn/tavern in Whiterun. Violet's boss is the owner of the Bannered Mare - a middle-aged woman named Hulda. An older Redguard woman named Saadia and a younger Redguard woman named Tamda also work as barmaids there. A woman named Lyne also works as a barmaid there, and additionally helps coordinate the renting of rooms at the inn. 
Violet is a tall Nord woman with long flowing brown hair and pretty blue eyes. She typically wears a somewhat revealing barmaid outfit, typical of barmaids in Skyrim. When working, Violet walks around the tavern serving drinks and food.
name: Violet
